response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance to me, but I am confident it could also be a remarkable addition to your collection or business. Before we proceed, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. Would you consider purchasing this product for $750,000? I believe this price reflects its true worth and provides you with an excellent opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a competitive rate. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 750000}
